post.text: If Trump stands by what he said about women as "locker room talk," he's clearly not sorry.

comment.author: Allesondra
comment.text: The most repugnant thing happened before the debate when Trunp sat piously between woman who say they were sexually asaulted while HE bragged earlier about sexually asaulting a woman! Talk about exploitation of women!! "Locker room talk, just words" no apology, what an insult he is to women.Then during the debate he became stalker in chief hovering behind Hillary. Hillary is the most qualifed person to be president!!

replies.author: Lauren
replies.text: The hag supporters are having a rough time. Lol! I'm looking forward to President Trump's special prosecutor. üçª

replies.author: Dakota
replies.text: Get over it. Words said in private are just that. With your reasoning, every man and or woman who have talked dirty in private are therefore as guilty as Trump. My husband and I used to have Mr. President dirty talk all the time in private about Monika and Mr. President! Wink, wink. And Bill lied till the end about it and it blows. Vote TRUMP and then maybe, just maybe we can have our Country back from where Hiliary and Obama has put us. MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN

replies.author: Kayla
replies.text: So these new Wikileaks today mention that Clinton campaign was worried about Bill Clinton's sexual escapades and so much more. https://www.rt.com/usa/362255-clinton-podesta-wikileaks-emails/
